wishes.text: There’s no other love like The love for a brother There’s no other love like The love from a brother Happy Raksha Bandhan!
May this sacred bond, between us, grow each day stronger and our affection manifold increase. Happy Raksha Bandhan!
Dear Brother, On this day of Raksha Bandhan, I Wish you blessings from heavenly divine. Happy Raksha Bandhan!
On this day of Raksha Bandhan, I Wish you blessings from heavenly divine. Happy Raksha Bandhan!
Holi is colourful, Diwali is lightful and Rakhi is a powerful relationship. Happy Raksha Bandhan 2020
We share a strong bond. May it grow stronger with the passage of time. Happy Rakhi!
Dear sister, you are my best friend and I would never want to part from you. Happy Rakhi!
Khushiyo ka Tyohar, Mithaiyo ki Barsaat, Har bahen ko apne bhai ka intezar, Kyo ki Ye he raksha bandan ka tyohar! Happy Rakhsha Bandhan
On this auspicious occasion of Rakhi, I wish our special bond grows with every moment. Happy Rakhi Bhai !!
The memories may fade away with tym, but the special bond of love we share will grow ever stronger. Happy Raksha Bandhan
I Wish u Happy Rakhi..Sisters are the most precious gift of life..I thank God for giving me such a precious gift.
Phoolon Ka Taaron Ka Sabka Kehna Hai Ek Hazaron Mein Meri Behna Hai Love You My Sweet Sister! Happy Rakhsha Bandhan
